About the Company: Medico Remedies Private Limited is a leading manufacturer and exporter of pharmaceutical formulations including tablets, capsules and suspensions. It has a strong presence in various therapeutic categories like antidiabetics, antihypertensives, antiretroviral, anticoagulants, antimalarials, antihistaminics, multivitamins, anti-inflammatory etc.
